pageContext.claim: “My son Donald did a good job last night. He was open, transparent and innocent. This is the greatest Witch Hunt in political history. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: Donald Trump Jr. only released the emails facing a pending report on the content of the emails by the New York Times. Moreover, Trump exaggerates by calling the Trump-Russia stories the "greatest Witch Hunt in political history." For context: The Government Accountability Office concluded that the equivalent of $132 million was spent on independent probes during Bill Clinton's presidency, culminating in the impeachment trial in the Senate that left him in office.
